meanings.definition: A person who has a fear or hatred of women.
meanings.sent1: The gynophobe avoided talking to any women at the party.
meanings.sent2: She was labeled a gynophobe because of her extreme fear of women.
meanings.sent3: The gynophobe's heart raced whenever he saw a group of women approaching.
meanings.sent4: Her brother teased her, calling her a gynophobe whenever she blushed around girls.
meanings.sent5: The gynophobe's irrational fear of women made it difficult for him to socialize.

meanings.definition: To have an irrational fear or hatred of women.
meanings.sent1: He gynophobes interacting with women due to his deep-seated fear.
meanings.sent2: She gynophobes any situation where she has to confront women.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he gynophobes doing laundry more than anything else.
meanings.sent4: Her anxiety gynophobed her from attending the women's empowerment event.
meanings.sent5: The politician's controversial statements gynophobe him in the eyes of many voters.
